tool_description: If you're looking for a random adult picture, our API is just what you need. Simply send a request to our API and you'll receive a random adult picture in return. Whether you need a picture for a project or just for fun, our API is perfect.
title: rapid-porn

api_list.name: /photo
api_list.description:
This is where the fun starts, replace category with a value to get ;))
If you get 500 Internal Server Error,
Please cross check your category inserted from the all-tags endpoint.

api_list.name: /all-tags
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rapid-porn.p.rapidapi.com/all-tags"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rapid-porn.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
